nodes.bodyText: this is not needed. We don't need to disable the OSGi service component.
why we set OAuth1FieldDisabled to true when OAuth1 is enabled?
let's not hard-code the /api/identity/oauth2/dcr. Instead let's add "Refer the WSO2 official documentation for more information <link>"
change as "Identity Connect DCR endpoint is deprecated and hence disabled by default in the server. To enable it add the following config..."
